chapters.title: Chapter 3: At the Gardens
chapters.info: Meidani, p. 139—Tall, slender Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah. She has dark golden hair. Her Warder is Leonin. She was one of the Aes Sedai sent back to the Tower by the Aes Sedai in Salidar as a spy under the guise that she was obeying Elaida's summons.
